message.body: What a wonderful surprise! I have very loose plans that I will happily cancel. Where are you staying?

Oh cool! I'm sorry I didn't think of it sooner. I am staying with my dear friend and fellow ole Thomas Rusert in glenside. We r free by 9 and will be traveling with his lady from warrington. Is there a place we could meet up? Let us know if u have a car or not.
I don't have a car, sadly. And despite my PA citizenship I don't know where those places are. Would you maybe be coming into the city?
We are flexible. Where in the city are u? Thomas and I r up for anything around 9
Well dont let me impose. I'm in south Philly/center city but can get anywhere :)

Are u able to hop on the train and come to glenside around 9 ish? I'm at the whim of friends here ;) there is a cool pub they are wanting o go to tonight and the train ride is just north about 20 minutes from u!
That sounds great! What's the address of the pub?
Thomas say we can pick u up at the train station. We r going to his I laws but will be back by 9
Oh that's really generous of you, thank you. I'll be in touch and aim for around 9 :)

Those flexible plans may be harder to break than I expected... I'm afraid I'll totally disappoint a friend if I don't keep them. I apologize for not making it out there - I really regret not seeing you. But safe travels and when I'm home I'm sept. I'm looking you up.
No worries! It was last minute. Until September then
